scripts.build: pnpm --filter miniapp build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.resolve('miniapp','dist');const dst=path.resolve('bot-server','public-miniapp');fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true});console.log('Copied miniapp dist -> bot-server/public-miniapp');"
